given.scenario: Navigate to the front page of Handow Lab, verify the buttons available in view

acts.title:
Given I go to 
Handow_Lab
(http://www.handow.org/lab)
cnslErrors: Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 (Not Found)

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Lab_Version_Button
(#button-lab-version)
is displayed

And I can see 
Lab_Preset_Button
(#button-add-jack)
is displayed

whens.scenario: Click button get lab version

acts.title:
When I click 
Lab_Version_Button
(#button-lab-version)

And I wait 
Spin
(#ajax-loading-spin)
is disappeared

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Lab_Version_Showing
(message@h4w('v0.3.2@2020-02-07 01:11:24'))
is displayed

whens.scenario: Click button to add Jack Smth

parameters.Lab_User_Added: message@h4w('New user (Jack Smith) has been added')

acts.title:
When I click 
Lab_Preset_Button
(#button-add-jack)
and watch 
Post_Reset_User_XHR
([object Object])

headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/90.0.4427.0 Safari/537.36

acts.title:
And I set 
Test_Cookies
([object Object])
to current page

And I wait 
Spin
(#ajax-loading-spin)
is disappeared

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Lab_User_Added
(message@h4w('New user (Jack Smith) has been added'))
is displayed

And the cookie 
HANDOW_TOKEN
(HANDOW-TEXT-TOKEN)
with 
TOKEN_VALUE
(A182F6B9B52BCBBD01B1702A0B0E8E61)
available in current page
facts._title: the cookie {name} with {value} available in current page

whens.scenario: Access the GET_VERSION API and verify the Handow version property in response

acts.title:
When I send request 
XHR_Get_Version
([object Object])

facts.title:
Then I received response with 
HTTP200
(200)
HTTP status
facts._title: I received response with {status} HTTP status

facts.title:
And I received response with payload 
Handow_Version_Data
([object Object])

info.error: Received xhr response is not matching the following expected object at Object.doStep (C:\handow\handow-seed\stepBundles\factsBundle.js:557:23)

facts.title:
And I verify the cookies 
HANDOW_TOKEN
(HANDOW-TEXT-TOKEN)
exist

whens.scenario: XHR add Jack Smith

acts.title:
When I send request 
XHR_Post_User
([object Object])

set-cookie: __cfduid=d946285a2a91f0bedb122ae6447a78e561619926995; expires=Tue, 01-Jun-21 03:43:15 GMT; path=/; domain=.reqres.in; HttpOnly; SameSite=Lax; Secure

facts.title:
Then I received response with 
HTTP201
(201)
HTTP status
facts._title: I received response with {status} HTTP status

headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/90.0.4427.0 Safari/537.36

facts.title:

exist

given.scenario: Deepllink to Lab and navigate to DemoFileLoading page

acts.title:
Given I go to 
Local_Lab_Home
(http://www.handow.org/lab/)
cnslErrors: Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 (Not Found)

acts.title: And I wait all pending requests resolved
acts._title: I wait all pending requests resolved

acts.title:
And I click 
File_Loading_Index
(demo-probe-file@h4w)

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Upload_Button
(upload-files-button@h4w)
is displayed

whens.scenario: Choose a file with path relative with test project

acts.title:
When I click 
Choose_File_Probe
(choose-files-trigger@h4w)
and choose the files 
Uploading_File
(demo.txt)
acts._title: I click {xpath} and choose the files {paths}

facts.title:
Then I can see 
File_Bar
(uploading-file-name@h4w)
is showing 
File_Name
(demo.txt)

And I can see 
Upload_Button
(upload-files-button@h4w)
is enabled

whens.scenario: Upload the selected file

parameters.Upload_Success: The files have been uploaded successfully

acts.title:
When I click 
Upload_Button
(upload-files-button@h4w)

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Message_Bar
(#upload-message)
is showing 
Upload_Success
(The files have been uploaded successfully)

given.scenario: Deepllink to Lab and navigate to Proverty and Keyboard test view

acts.title:
Given I go to 
Handow_Lab
(http://www.handow.org/lab)
cnslErrors: Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 (Not Found)

acts.title: And I wait all pending requests resolved
acts._title: I wait all pending requests resolved

acts.title:
And I click 
Props_Keyboard_Entry
(demo-probe-propskeys@h4w)

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)
is displayed

whens.scenario: Fill the textarea input box

acts.title:
When I enter 
Example_Text
(demo text)
to 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)

And I focus on 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)

And I press keyboard 
Enter_Key
(Enter)

facts.title:
Then I can see 
Success_Message
(submit-review@h4w)
is displayed

And I cannot see 
Workspace_Clean
(workspace-status@h4w)
is displayed

And I can see the input 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)
value equals 
Box_Content
(demo text)
facts._title: I can see the input {selector} value equals {text}

whens.scenario: Verify DOM properties and active styles

acts.title: When I continue

facts.title:
Then I verify the property 
Name
(name)
of 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)
equals 
Textarea_Name
(textarea-demo)
facts._title: I verify the property {name} of {selector} equals {value}

facts.title:
And I verify the active style 
Color
(color)
of 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)
is 
Forestgreen
(rgb(34, 139, 34))
facts._title: I verify the active style {name} of {selector} is {value}

facts.title:
And I verify the active style 
Font_Size
(fontSize)
of 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)
is 
Size_18px
(18px)
facts._title: I verify the active style {name} of {selector} is {value}

whens.scenario: Clear textarea and message by keyboard shotcut

acts.title:
When I press keyboard shotcuts 
Shotcut_Clear
(ShiftLeft ControlLeft C)

facts.title:
Then I cannot see 
Success_Message
(submit-review@h4w)
is displayed

And I can see 
Workspace_Clean
(workspace-status@h4w)
is displayed

And I can see the input 
Demo_Textarea
(#demo-input-textarea)
value equals 
Box_Content
()
facts._title: I can see the input {selector} value equals {text}
